code: import React from"react";import{Card,Avatar,ActorDetails,ActorName,ActorCharacter}from"./ActorCards.styled";import API_Details from"../../../API_Details";import NoImage from"../../../Images/no_image.jpg";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ActorCards=function ActorCards(_ref){var profile=_ref.profile;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/actor/".concat(profile.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{initial:{scale:1},whileHover:{scale:1.05},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{src:profile.profile_path!==null?"".concat(API_Details.BASE_IMAGE_URL).concat(API_Details.POSTER_SIZE,"/").concat(profile.profile_path):NoImage,loading:"lazy",alt:"".concat(profile.name," profile image")}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ActorDetails,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActorName,{children:profile.name}),"as",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ActorCharacter,{children:profile.character})]})]})});};export default ActorCards;
